text:
@StephenKing Correction:

At least 96,000 dead, with and/or from coronavirus.
That's enough to fill USC Trojan stadium to capacity.
Trump is playing golf.
You’re being an ass.
Biden’s being racist.
I’m still not wearing a f*%king mask
